description:
All the comfort and function of the Heritage Newt Suit, with an extra layer of cozy. This iconic piece of kids' outdoor wear is lined with a soft, warm fleece. The outer waterproof-breathable fabric keep the elements out even in wet and windy conditions. It's warm enough for cool fall days (or west-coast winters) and is designed to fit over layers if the conditions call for extra insulation.

  • Relaxed fit offers plenty of space to layer and room to grow
  • Shell is abrasion-resistant 200-denier nylon with a polyurethane waterproof breathable coating and a DWR (durable water repellency) finish
  • Double-layered knees and bum add durability during life’s ups and downs
  • Fully lined with soft polyester fleece that adds a bit more warmth for cool days
  • Elasticized cuffs and hood edges seal out the cold and damp
  • Reflective details for low-light visibility
name: MEC Cozy Newt Suit - Infants to Children
